DOC.brief_title: Effect Body-mass Index ( BMI ) Median Effective Dose Intrathecal Hyperbaric Bupivacaine
DOC.detailed_description: The effect BMI requirement local anesthetic use spinal anesthesia well establish . The investigator try quantify effect BMI spinal anesthesia compare median effective dose ( ED50 ) intrathecal bupivacaine two different BMI group . The investigator determine ED50 ED 95 intrathecal hyperbaric bupivacaine subject BMI 27.5 kg/m2 , subject BMI 27.5 kg/m2 , respectively . By compare difference ED50 ED95 group , investigator try quantify effect BMI bupivacaine dose requirement .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective total knee replacement arthroplasty Patients previous spine surgery , diabetic neuropathy , skin infection site injection , allergy bupivacaine common contraindication spinal anesthesia exclude study . The patient height less 140 cm 160 cm , bodymass index ( BMI ) less 20 great 35 also exclude .
